document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2018-06
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA ADOPTING THE CANNABIS ORDINANCE CONSISTING OF A NEW CHAPTER 5.10 COMMERCIAL CANNABIS LICENSE AND AMENDING CHAPTER 19 ZONING ORDINANCE TO PERMIT CANNABIS INDOOR CULTIVATION, MANUFACTURING, TESTING, MICROBUSINESS, AND DISTRIBUTION IN THE GENERAL INDUSTRIAL ZONING DISTRICT
